articles.title: Gas prices climb for fifth straight week as oil surges - Fox Business
articles.description: Currently, the national average price for a gallon of gasoline is $3.34, up 6.8 cents from a month ago, according to GasBuddy.
articles.content:
The average price for a gallon of gasoline in the United States rose slightly for the fifth week in a row, climbing 2.9 cents from a week ago, according to an industry expert.
